text.text: Armor abilities are typically effective on a single type of armor. Each type of armor has a different special attribute:
• Helmets can be controlled using a keybinding for special effects.
• Chestplates can receive interaction abilities that are used when hands are empty. Most are covered in the interaction section.
• Leggings have inventory based abilities and passive boosts to the player.
• Boots provide movement and jump based abilities.
• Shields have special abilities on blocking, including stronger counterattack modifiers.
